text:
STACK | Software Engineer | Toronto, Canada | Onsite | https://www.getstack.ca/ We’re expanding our team, looking for some talented developers to deliver the ultimate personal finance platform. At STACK, we’re at the forefront of new technology, using the latest industry innovations to build a better way to bank. In a world full of giant consumer banks, STACK is a like having your own personal valet. STACK is a modern alternative to a traditional bank account. It lets you spend, save and share your money, fee-free and straight from your smartphone.

We're hiring for many roles including:

- Android/iOS engineer

- Ethereum/Blockchain engineer

- Data scientist/engineer

- NodeJS engineer

- Devops engineer

Please email thomas@getstack.ca if you’re interested in learning more.
